title: Emmerdale star James Moore celebrates girlfriend as she graduates university
text:
Emmerdale star James Moore’s girlfriend Sophie recently graduated from university.

James — who plays Ryan Stocks in the ITV soap — took to Instagram to mark the momentous occasion, as he shared a series of photos of the special day on his account.

In addition to the proud pictures, he captioned the post with a touching message: Words cannot begin to describe how proud I feel today. My girlfriend graduated with a masters degree!

She’s worked so hard this past year and has done so much to get here and I’m so so proud of everything she’s achieved!! I love you so much Sophie, and I can’t wait to see what the future holds for your career.’

‘You’re going to do some incredible things, and I’m lucky enough to be with you every step of the way.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Fans were quick to comment their messages of congratulations, with one saying: ‘Aww well done to her :) such a lovely couple xxx’, while another added: ‘Hugely well done Sophie and what a gorgeous couple’, with another commenting: ‘Aww Congratulations Sophie on your Masters Degree’.

Several of James’ Emmerdale co-stars also congratulated Sophie, with Emma Atkins — who plays on-screen mum Charity Dingle — adding: ‘WONDERFUL INCREDIBLE AMAZING.’

James made his first appearance in Emmerdale last year when it was revealed that Charity had given birth to a child when she was a teenager. However, she’d presumed that he’d died and thus was shocked to learn that he was very much alive.

Ryan has recently struck up a friendship with Matty (Ash Palmisicano), and was last seen threatening to ruin Kim Tate’s (Claire King) business venture.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: James marked the momentous occasion with a couple of proud pictures.
